body:
Update Cantera to 2.5.1 which includes many few features and bug fixes!

**Summarized Changelog:**
- Added a new, YAML-based input file format.
- Add interface for reading and writing 1D Flame and SolutionArray objects from/to HDF5 files.
- Add BinarySolutionTabulatedThermo class, which implements implements tabulated standard state thermodynamics in a binary solution.
- Introduce C++ Solution class to simplify creation of coupled ThermoPhase, Kinetics, and Transport objects.
- Determine Redlich-Kwong parameters from a database of critical property data.
- Make transport property calculations available for pure fluid water phases.

The full changelog can be found [here](https://github.com/Cantera/cantera/releases/tag/v2.5.1).

**Test Plan:**
2.5.1 built successfully within the Autamus Build Workflow [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/runs/2429279825).
title: Update Cantera to 2.5.1
